title: X.Wordpress.Theme.v2.6.0-THEMEFOREST

Name: X - The Theme
Type: Wordpress Theme

Updated: 7 October 14

Software Version: WordPress 4.0, 3.9, 3.8, 3.7, 3.6
Compatible With: BuddyPress 2.0.x, WooCommerce 2.1.x, bbPress 2.5.x, Gravity Forms

Files Included: PHP Files, CSS Files, JS Files, PSD
Widget Ready: Yes

We consulted numerous individuals and asked them what sort of features they wanted to see in a theme from an SEO standpoint, design, feature-set, et cetera, and built their suggestions right into the theme.
